## Why this domain should be blocked
Describe the observed behavior and risk.
Be specific and factual.

Examples:
- Malware delivery
- Phishing page
- Scam or impersonation
- Command-and-control endpoint
- Exploit hosting
- Ad fraud
- Tracking abuse

- Screenshots

- VirusTotal links (if allowed)
- Logs or timestamps
